subject: Tennis
Murders and Attempted Murders
Crime and Criminals
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Lois Ann Goodman, 70, was taken into custody in connection with the death of her husband in April. Prosecutors say she bludgeoned him to death with a coffee mug.
snippet: Lois Ann Goodman, 70, was taken into custody in connection with the death of her husband in April. Prosecutors say she bludgeoned him to death with a coffee mug.
